items.text: Consistently great food, with a pretty unique "backlane" atmosphere. Try the refreshing salty lemonade!

The menu offers a great choice of dishes. Nicely decorated and brings cozy atmosphere to customers. Portion of noodles and some others can be a bit smaller than expected compared to the prices we pay.
Authentic pho, great meatballs, and nice ambience.
The spring rolls, fried noodles beef lemongrass
Pho is probably the best I tried in Singapore.
Great pho with reasonable rice
The Pho Dac Biet (special beef combo) is actually a sliced beef and brisket noodle with an egg.
Pork chop rice at $7 quite decent. Yoghurt drink had more ice than anything else, though. Cash only
Saigon salted lemonade, special combination beef pho and pork spring roll - all good!
Feels like eating in Vietnam. Real local taste! Love it!
Yummylicious! Most authentic pho I found in SG!
Pho was delicious here! Try the beef balls in the appetizer it is amazing! Go ahead and order multiple servings.
Exceptional. Best Vietnamese food ever. Fresh ingredients. Delicious. Highly recommend!
Pork chop rice; meatballs, salty lemonade.
Nice beef pho, meat balls, paper rolls, avocado smoothie, with old school feel... Nice!
The food here is authentic and the taste is great. Try the beef soup with an egg (side order). For drink, try the salty lemonade! The place is pretty busy in the evening!
The pho. Just try it.
Meatballs are these little sphere of umami goodness. Pho was full of flavor but wished they were more generous with garnishing (onions, mint leaves, sprouts). Usually pho places don't skimp on these.
The stir fried cockles and herbal tea is really good !!!
I don't know what it means when their Pho is good but their Pork Cutlet rice is better. I think Mrs Pho has an identity crisis.
Lovely Pho! I love it. I suggest you try 'pho dac biet' with half boiled egg!
Very flavorful and well-spiced but light broth. Nice.
Authentic vietnamese pho with superb taste of dripping coffee.
Amazingly tasty Vietnamese food. Yaaamy!
Pork chop rice, fried cockles, meat balls, beef pho , herbal tea, salty lemonade
Fresh shrimp roll (goi cuon/ gỏi cuốn), refreshing vermicelli with pork and spring roll, avocado smoothie, Hanoi meat balls, cockles stir-fried with garlic, beef noodle soup.
Not as nice as Little Vietnam at Guillemard and selection is limited too.
We had cockles, pork chop rice and beef pho. Particularly enjoyed the cockles - very flavorful!
An awesome Vietnamese restaurant basically across the street from your hotel.
Soup is good. Overall, still pretty average though.
Pho is good as that's the name of the shop. Always try the fried meatballs as appetizers and their fresh spring rolls are to die for.

Don't believe Yelp reviews -- Californian pho is not better than this! What Californian pho place also gives you a range of great cha, nem nuong (ham and meatballs), and coconut milkshake?! Way better
Nice place with an old school kinda ambience. We enjoyed our beef pho; soup was flavorful and price per pax was relatively cheap too.
Get the stir-fried cockles, get a pho, put the lard bits from the cockles in the pho - instant WIN!
Pho, fried spring rolls, coconut smoothie
Cockles - dry-fried with a sweet-savory sauce with bits of lard!! So shiok!
Excellent Pho
Papaya salad
Vale muito a experiência da comida vietinamita.
Great beef pho - authentic tastes. Also love the summer spring rolls. May have a little too much MSG if you're sensitive to that
Had a pho bo dac biet and thoroughly enjoyed it. Spring rolls (goi cuon) also nice. My dining company was enthusiastic about the bun thit nuong cha gio. Only downside was slightly flaky service.
What can I say, this is my favorite Vietnamese restaurant on the island, with great price points and ultra tasty apps and pho.
Excellent taste. Even the Vietnamese in SG flock to this place. Good to the last drop. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Food is great but the bad service has left a bitter taste.
The boss is really friendly and the pho was good. Do try the chicken wings!
Love. Mrs Pho can be my mom
Even thought it's a pho store, must try their meatballs, rice with pork chop and spring rolls 😌
Sliced beef pho, meatballs & salty lemonade are a must try!
Vietnamese coffee - hint of roasted goodness sans the sour aftertaste. Tasty beef pho, esp the soup; beef is a tad tough. The oil + gravy of the fried cockles goes great with rice. Beats namnam 😽
stewed beef noodles, fried spring rolls and some yoghurt to wash it all down! <3 wish there were more than 3 spring rolls in each order though 😩
fried spring roll
Love the combo pho. Recommended!
The pork chop rice is delicious, as are the spring rolls and meatballs. Get the salty lemonade; it's pretty darn refreshing. Very reasonable prices for good food.
You will walk past the shop without realizing it as the signboard is not very prominent. Entrees are good for small eaters with bite-size portions only. Decent Viet pho to satisfy a craving.
Only tried the beef pho and summer spring rolls. Both dishes were very authentic and reasonably priced. Can't wait to come back and try other stuff on the menu
Pho and the pork chop dry beehoon
Pho and meatballs are amazing. Fast and friendly service.
Pork chop rice is yummy! And if you need a refreshing drink on a hot day, go for the herbal tea. My favorite small bites - meat balls! So good!
The fried cockles with bits of sweet sticky yummy pork lard. So tasty! 👍
Big big bowl... Yummy!!!
The pho. Very authentic Vietnamese noodles.
Amazing Pho and try the meatballs! I would have left a pic but ate them before realizing this.
Very affordable and nice viet food! Though it's really a small place
Mango is a MUST plus meat balls and chix wings!
Lamingtons here I am!
I love this fresh spring rolls - but not with this hoisin dip. I prefer the lime-chili one tho.
No credit cards :-( accepted but great food ;-)
Salt lemonade drink is awesome. Pho taste like the one we used to have in HCM which is SUPER! Papaya salad quadruple thumbs up!
Authentic pho, summer rolls n spring rolls. Unpretentious eatery. Sincere n earnest service.Beats Nam Nam hands down in terms of service, price n authenticity. Great viet iced coffee too!
Go early. When they run out of stuff it's all over. They only had one of six kinds of pho left! Fried spring roll appetizer was out of this world
アイススケートのあとは、ここまであしをのばす価値あり！
Meatballs and pho are excellent! Salty lemonade was refreshing, but may have been a bit too salty. Love the Vietnamese coffee here as the finishing touch. :)
Bun Bo Hue
Surprisingly the chicken noodles is better than the pho, imho. Salty lemonade is refreshing. Fried cockles is a heng-suay dish, when it's bad, it's very baaaaad, like sewage-smelly. Oops.
